title: 188: What Happened on Our Spring Break? | Ear Biscuits Ep. 188
description:
Link’s London freak out session and a McLaughlin almost in tears from excruciating pain are just a few of the highlights from Spring Break 2019 for these two middle-aged dads. Listen to more of their family adventures on this episode of Ear Biscuits!
We're nominated for the Webby Awards! Vote for us as Best Podcast Hosts, Best Comedy Podcast, and for GMM as Best Variety Series while you're at it!
